text: 13.14: Lo 13.1; 13.4; 2 Te 2.9-10; VB 12.9; 19.20Fhe Bakɨme fhura ana garim, ana mba fharigi ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga nɨman mbarkɨrga mirikori ga mbui. Ana mba tɨva mbuav, ana ne nzuav guigira kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi guiguigi. Ana khaŋ mba gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai, “Nde kha ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga tuma kargip, ana zɨ ndi vun kuamkuari. Mba ruaŋruaŋgi sɨk, mbe fhum ntari ga mbui kozar ana shogim, ana rimgi fhuvara. Ana mbara muuŋgiap khar ki.”
